overview: Two friends, Ian and Hyejin meet in front of a movie theatre. Hyejin brings along a new friend, Jungwon. The three of them try to go to see a film but manages to get only two tickets. Sending the girl alone to watch the film, the two boys, Ian and Jungwon, end up staying behind in a caf√© while they wait for Hyejin to come out of the theatre. In the meantime the two boys start telling stories to each other.
title: Tell Tale
